website_summaries.verdict: Unique looking 3-tiered serving tray that's great for finishing a rustic theme in a display.
pros: Excellent build quality, consisting of galvanized metal
Has a large handle at the top, so you can carry it anywhere
Large lower tray at 16-inches in diameter, so it will hold quite a few items nicely
cons: Trays have tall lips, which can make it difficult to grab small items

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stand and use it for the centerpiece of my kitchen table, but it isn’t sturdy which makes it almost useless. The metal rod that you insert through the center won’t tighten. I can’t tell if it’s stripped or just too short, but either way, it doesn’t work. The stand is extremely wobbly and if it isn’t perfectly balanced then it sits lopsided and looks horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tray
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I’m happy with my galvanized tray, excellent package and easy to assembly
customer_reviews.author: Rita Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Put christmas saucers and mugs on it. Very sturdy. Could lift it with everything on it and move as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Agan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had originally given a one star review. However, the company contacted me and I am extremely impressed with the handling of my complaint and the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Classy, and Super Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, versatile, and easy to assemble. I have used it now for both a Halloween and Christmas tray and can't count the number of complements I have gotten. Loved it so much, I purchased one for my father-in-law...and filled it with three levels of beer ;-).
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to organize my tea tins. and other tea products that I use on a daily basis, that would keep them all together, be easily seen and better than stacking by themselves on my counter. This is perfect....in fact I ordered another one to use for more items on my kitchen counters. Very easy to assemble and came packaged very well, shipped without any damage. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wedding but when it arrived it was missing the main assembly part. There is a large threaded dowel needed that goes through the middle of each tier to hold them in place. Without this piece the rest is irrelevant. Needless to say I have never gotten to use it. It looks to be of nice sturdy quality but I can't really say.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: main center rod is hidden in styrofoam inside box!
customer_reviews.text: could not find center rod - it was hidden inside the box. Needed it to assemble 3 tier tray
customer_reviews.author: Everythingbagel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very nice, sturdy and a perfect cupcake stand for my daughter's cowgirl birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes and comes together so easily, also comes with a small burlap bag to place the smart parts in for storage in your home so if you don’t want to display it all the time and only use it for parties! A very thoughtful addition!
customer_reviews.author: sarah pringle

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this stand - used it for a super bowl party and not only did it offer plenty of room for cupcakes, cookies and other treats, the height was perfect for placing other levels of platters and stands around it. So easy to assemble too! Can't wait for another party!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Not everything came in the box - missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Only recieved the three pieces and no rod for the center a bag to hold the pieces in. I got this for a friend in another country and now I don’t know how to get the extra parts to mail to her. Nice product but wish all the pieces came.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made tray!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. It is large! Will hold lots of items.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Withrow

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our wedding and use in our home. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to put this together to find the main part missing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this? Can be used for so many different displays.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nieces wedding. It was a great display for the s’mores. The guest absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile- so many uses- love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have already used once for fruit and once with flowers for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: East Assembly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! Will be using it in my 50th Wedding Anniversary!!! Thanks for this great galvanized serving tray!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Cute farmhouse tiered tray
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and quite large! I would prefer to downsize just a bit. Overall I love the look!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had been looking for. Perfect for Christmas display
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mincham

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and nice quality. It is a lot bigger than it looks diameter wise. I should have looked at measurements better but still going to keep. Christmas mugs look great in it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Used at our daughter's barn wedding reception for the caterer to present the fruit kabobs as an appetizer. There are hundreds of uses for this 3 tier tray and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Haley

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it , is exactly what it said it was and looks great on my table
customer_reviews.author: marylou

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a rehearsal dinner. It worked well to hold all the supplies for a s’mores bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Price

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece for her birthday and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tray
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 3 tiered tray so much that I bought a second one for my friend...!!!
customer_reviews.author: julie hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom's birthday present and it was worth every penny. Perfect size and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mock

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition for my kitchen island and I decorate for each holiday and season.
customer_reviews.author: Motown Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great time, very sturdy. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Price/quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Worked amazing on three separate occasions. Is sturdy and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the central rod. Is it possible to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size. I used it in my bathroom to organize my counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and roomy tray
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a wood tiered tray but bought this when I could not find one in wood the size and style I wanted. This one is quite nice and large! I like that I can stand decorations up and not have them scrunched in to fit. I think it will hold the larger mugs I usually put out at Christmas time. I do use shredded paper curls to fill in the space. I is very nice and I am enjoying decorating it for the holidays. I am very happy with this tiered tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rustic farmhouse decor
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my son's 1st birthday to put the cookie favors on. It looked so amazing and was big enough to fit all the cookies with room to spare. It was super easy to put together and sturdy. I can't wait for the chance to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: cmm318

customer_reviews.title: Great for food display.
customer_reviews.text: We love this tray! We were able to put so much food into the layers of the tray. The bottom try is deep and allowed us to keep the oysters fresh with ice. The tray is easy to clean and disassemble for storing. It comes with a pouch to keep the pieces safe. Look forward to using this for various decorations and food display.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful farmhouse 3 tiered tray
customer_reviews.text: This 3 tiered tray is beautiful and well made. It is all metal, even the rods and the handle. No plastic! Easy to assemble. I’m so in love with it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Carey

customer_reviews.title: Assemble completely before panicking .
customer_reviews.text: This tiered tray is exactly what I wanted and exactly as it was advertised. While assembling the product I became very concerned that the product was going to lean, however once I finished getting all the tiers together and tightened up, nice and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and easy to transport!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for seasonal decor, the bottom tray is roomy enough for a lot of stuff! It's easy to transport, too, when I take craft supplies to vision board parties. Great value and fun to style.
customer_reviews.author: TabithaDaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. Bought it to hold desserts at a party. It’s beautiful, it could also be used to hold craft items or anything.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: So I jumped onto the 3-tier stand bandwagon. This one does not disappoint. Absolutely perfect! Bigger than expected. Super sturdy enough to hold all of my seasonal decorations and mugs. TOO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Ellygra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big. Doesn’t limit how you can use it because it is large enough to hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Tray
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it’s a bit bigger than I thought it was. It will be fine for what I am going to use it for
customer_reviews.author: Thais Dianne Menges

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! When I put it together it was huge!!! I love it !!! Definitely bigger than I expected !!!
customer_reviews.author: tammy williams

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Well made...large. Compared to others that were smaller this was an excellant price! I Will find somewhere to use it! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter in law. She seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: JWG

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality & very nice size. I’m using mine as a center piece dining room table. I change the decor in center piece each holiday. Everyone enjoys that.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, going to look great on my bar.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

product_meta.title: 3 Tier Galvanized Metal Stand (Large) Twin Handle Farmhouse Style Serving Tray | Perfect for Rustic, Vintage Decoration in Kitchen and Dining Room
product_meta.description:
Create a Warm and Welcoming Home with this 3 Tier Galvanized Metal Stand
The perfect essential for home / kitchen / dining settings of different themes & occasions - such as farmhouse-themed party, Easter, Thanksgiving and Christmas. It can also set a warm vintage tone for your cafe, bars or restaurants. Popular DIY settings or tips of decorations can be easily found online too.
The package comes with: 

3 round serving trays made from premium galvanized metal Central rods for holding the trays Twin handle to display cards or labelsStep-by-step installation guide
Main Item Specifications: Bottom Tray: 16 inch diameter Middle Tray: 12 inch diameter Top Tray: 10 inch diameter Total height: 18 inch Total weight: 4.5 lbs
feature_bullets: Premium Galvanized Metal for Rustic and Vintage Look
Round and Deep Trays to Display Food, Pastries, Coffee Mugs and Various Kitchen/Dining Decor
Elegant Twin Handle Design to Display Cards, Labels and Artwork
Easy Assembly and Sturdy Structure Suitable for Kitchen, Dining Table, Cafe, Restaurants, and Garden
Versatile for Different Settings as Farmhouse Style, Holidays Celebrations, Vintage Decor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
